description: Load an ONNX model from a local file path or a remote URL and assign it a unique name.
comment: Supports local paths and remote URLs; caches remote models.

description: Unload a model, freeing its associated resources.
Scan a directory for .onnx files, load them automatically, and return a JSON report.
comment: Returns JSON with loaded models and any errors.

description: Return a JSON array containing the names of all currently loaded models.
Return a JSON object with metadata for a specific loaded model (name, input/output shapes).
comment: Throws an error if the model is not loaded.

description: Perform inference on a batch of data; returns a single float value per input row.
comment: Features accept FLOAT, DOUBLE, INTEGER, BIGINT, DECIMAL (cast to float).

description: Perform inference and return all outputs as a JSON-encoded array.
comment: Useful for models that produce multiple predictions per sample.

description: Perform inference and return outputs as a typed LIST\[FLOAT\].
comment: Avoids JSON parsing for multi-output models.

description: Perform inference on raw BLOB data (e.g., image tensor); returns LIST\[FLOAT\].
comment: Accepts raw tensor BLOB data from a column.

description: Return true if the given model is currently loaded, otherwise false.
Return a JSON object with version and build information for the Infera extension.
Clear the entire model cache directory to free up disk space.
Return cache statistics: directory path, total size in bytes, file count, and configured size limit.
